mapper.select: /* GoodsMapper.getGoodsMerchList: 상품 분류 목록 조회 */ SELECT GOODS_MERCH_ID , GOODS_MERCH_NM FROM GOODS_MERCH_BASE ORDER BY GOODS_MERCH_ID
/* GoodsMapper.getBrandList: 브랜드 목록 조회 */ SELECT BRAND_NO , BRAND_NM FROM BRAND_BASE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DISP_ORD ASC, BRAND_NO ASC

/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsDetail: 관리자 상품 상세 조회 */ SELECT GOODS_ID , GOODS_DIV_CD , GOODS_STAT_CD , GOODS_NM , GOODS_GROUP_ID , GOODS_MERCH_ID , SUPPLY_AMT , SALE_AMT , SHOW_YN , ERP_SUPPLY_AMT , ERP_COST_AMT , ERP_STYLE_CD , ERP_COLOR_CD , ERP_MERCH_CD FROM GOODS_BASE WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}

/* GoodsMapper.getAdminCategoryTreeList: 관리자 카테고리 트리 목록 조회 */ SELECT C1.CATEGORY_ID , C1.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID , C1.CATEGORY_LEVEL , C1.CATEGORY_NM , C1.DISP_ORD , C1.SHOW_YN , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CATEGORY C2 WHERE C2.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = C1.CATEGORY_ID ) AS CHILD_COUNT FROM CATEGORY C1 ORDER BY C1.CATEGORY_LEVEL ASC, C1.DISP_ORD ASC, C1.CATEGORY_ID ASC
/* GoodsMapper.getAdminCategoryDetail: 관리자 카테고리 상세 조회 */ SELECT CATEGORY_ID , PARENT_CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_LEVEL , CATEGORY_NM , DISP_ORD , SHOW_YN FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}

/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsCategoryList: 관리자 상품 카테고리 목록 조회 */ SELECT GC.GOODS_ID , GC.CATEGORY_ID , GC.DISP_ORD , CASE C.CATEGORY_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN C.CATEGORY_ID WHEN 2 THEN P1.CATEGORY_ID WHEN 3 THEN P2.CATEGORY_ID END AS LEVEL1_ID , CASE C.CATEGORY_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN NULL WHEN 2 THEN C.CATEGORY_ID WHEN 3 THEN P1.CATEGORY_ID END AS LEVEL2_ID , CASE C.CATEGORY_LEVEL WHEN 3 THEN C.CATEGORY_ID ELSE NULL END AS LEVEL3_ID FROM GOODS_CATEGORY GC JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_ID = GC.CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY P1 ON P1.CATEGORY_ID = C.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY P2 ON P2.CATEGORY_ID = P1.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID WHERE GC.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} ORDER BY GC.DISP_ORD ASC, GC.CATEGORY_ID ASC

/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsSizeList: 관리자 상품 사이즈 목록 조회 */ SELECT GOODS_ID , SIZE_ID , STOCK_QTY , ADD_AMT , ERP_SYNC_YN , ERP_SIZE_CD , DISP_ORD , DEL_YN FROM GOODS_SIZE WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DISP_ORD ASC, SIZE_ID ASC

/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsSizeDetail: 관리자 상품 사이즈 단건 조회 */ SELECT GOODS_ID , SIZE_ID , STOCK_QTY , ADD_AMT , ERP_SYNC_YN , ERP_SIZE_CD , DISP_ORD , DEL_YN FROM GOODS_SIZE WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} AND SIZE_ID = #{sizeId}
/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsImageList: 관리자 상품 이미지 목록 조회 */ SELECT IMG_NO , GOODS_ID , DISP_ORD , IMG_PATH FROM GOODS_IMG WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} ORDER BY DISP_ORD ASC, IMG_NO ASC
/* GoodsMapper.getAdminGoodsImageByNo: 관리자 상품 이미지 단건 조회 */ SELECT IMG_NO , GOODS_ID , DISP_ORD , IMG_PATH FROM GOODS_IMG WHERE IMG_NO = #{imgNo}
